name: Bull Racing & Riding
description:
Get ready to join the league of daredevils and race on charged prestigious bull breed from India.Deadly Bull Racing is an intense action racing game which pits your driving skills against these desperate Bulls to take you down.
Crash and bash through smash-able scenery in this Bull Racing Game,

*****Features*****
*****Stunning 3D graphics.
*****Cool sound effects.
*****Large, beautiful, scenes to drive through.
***** Physics based chaos and mayhem.
*****Ground-breaking, easy to use driving controls.
